programme.title: The Ashes Live
programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of day one of the series-concluding Fifth Test, held at Sydney Cricket Ground. The teams last met here in this format three years ago, when the Fourth Test was drawn, with Australia's Usman Khawaja claiming the player of the match award as the series remained 3-0 in his team's favour.

programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Leeds United v Manchester United (Kick-off 12.30pm). All the action from the match at Elland Road. The sides last met here in February 2023, when late goals by Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho gave the visitors a 2-0 win, but neither of those players are currently at the club, and Leeds will hope for a competitive display in front of their own fans.

programme.title: The Ashes Live
programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of day two of the series-concluding Fifth Test, held at Sydney Cricket Ground. Australia have a slight upper hand in the six Ashes Tests players here since the turn of the century, winning three and losing two, with the most recent contest between the sides at this venue ending in a draw four years ago.

programme.title: Live: Serie A
programme.desc: Lazio v Napoli (Kick-off 11.30am). All the action from the Italian top-flight match at Stadio Olimpico. Although Napoli won the league last term, Lazio took four points from the two league meetings between the sides, winning 1-0 in Naples and drawing 2-2 here, and they also claimed a 3-1 home win when the teams met in the Coppa Italia.
